Alias.name: help
Alias.script:
echo("
Your vision blurs as a sudden wealth of information becomes available with a touch you can gain access to:
") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Newbie guide", [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/newbie-guides")]], "Guide explaining this games basic interworkings", true) echo(" ") --There is a bug with cechoLink tabs cause issues
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Character creation guide", [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/character-generator")]], "Character creation tutorial", true) echo("

")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Help Anything", [[printCmdLine("help ")]], "wiki search", true) echo(" Type help followed by anything. " .." You will be able to search the wiki for it.

")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">World maps", [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/maps")]], "Maps of all major areas in this game", true) echo(" ") --There is a bug with cechoLink tabs cause issues
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Hunting grounds", [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/hunting-grounds")]], "Maps and explanation of hunting areas", true) echo("

")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Commands", [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/commands")]], "Full list of game commands", true) echo(" ")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Commune with mortals", [[openUrl("https://discord.gg/fevBA8j")]], "TEC Discord", true) echo("

")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Full respitory of this worlds interworkings", [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/")]], "wiki site home", true) echo("

")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">help client", [[tecClientFullHelp(false, "main")]], "wiki site home", true)
echo("
With some effort you are able focus your mind and clear your vision back to reality.

")

Alias.name: Help (.w+)
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "client" then
else --The user tried to get help for something we have not created --a help for. So we will search the wiki site for them. echo("\nTry as you may you can not remember. Would you like to search the great beyond for\n")
--Turns just the background of the word(s) blue "<color:color>" --For font than background colors --command is the global for what is in command line. --string.sub pulls text from a string. In this case what starts AT --Line 6 than after. cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">"..string.sub(command, 6),
--if clicked, opens a link to [[openUrl("http://eternal-city.wikidot.com/search:site/q/"..string.sub(command, 6))]],
--Tool tip that appears when moused over. --True if I recall is needed for a bug fix. "Search the wiki for: "..string.sub(command, 6), true) echo("\n\n") end --if matches[2] == "client" else

Alias.name: help client
Alias.script: --run the client help command. It is a function so it can be clicked. tecClientFullHelp(false, "main")

Alias.name: display reset
Alias.script: --Sets guiframe back to default settings --these settings can be found in scripts - tec client scripts - community scripts - guiframe tecClientDisplayReset()

Alias.name: Dispay update autowrap
Alias.script:
--set main window word wrap size. --Function is is scripts - GUI - GUI Functions setMainWindowAutoWrap() echo("\nScreen wrap adjusted\n")
--No need to grant users access. This works automatically.

Alias.name: Display Open Communication
Alias.script:
--Indended for future use
--opens an external comm hideWindow openUserWindow("UndockCommWindow")
--for this to be functional the communications filters need a --method of checking if this window exists.

Alias.name: display clear characters
Alias.script: --in tecFunctions - autocheck - room character checks clearRoomCharacterWindow() --I don't think players need access to this as it autoruns

Alias.name: tecclient load
Alias.script:
--Load settings from file.
--True echos to the user if it was successfull tecFileLoadSettings(true)

Alias.name: tecclient reset
Alias.script:
--reloads user profile. Can't complete this right now. --resetProfile()
--reset tec client settings to default. Not display though. tecClientReset(true)

Alias.name: font Size
Alias.script: tecClientSetFontSize(tonumber(matches[2])) --matches[2] is the word in () in the pattern

Alias.name: font
Alias.script: echo([[ The font command is used to change font settings. Currently you can change the size of the font. Uses are: font size, changes the size of the font to the size entered. IE: font 12, sets the font size to 12. Current font size: ]]..getTECFont())

Alias.name: tecclient font size #
Alias.script: tecClientSetFontSize(tonumber(matches[2])) --matches[2] is the word in () in the pattern

Alias.name: tecclient update check
Alias.script: tecUpdate.checkVersion() --check if an update is needed.

Alias.name: tecclient save versions
Alias.script: --Intended for developers. tecUpdate.saveVersions() --Saves versions table to file.

Alias.name: debug off
Alias.script:
--function in scripts - variables. setTECDebugMode(false)
--Turn off debug display also setTECDisplayDebugMode(false)
--turn off map debug mode setTECMapDebugMode(false)
--turn off timer debug mesages setTECTimerDebugMode(false)
echo("\nAll debug modes off.\n")

Alias.name: debug video off
Alias.script: --Disable output of video debug display setTECDisplayDebugMode(false)

Alias.name: debug map on
Alias.script: --Enable debug output for tec map setTECMapDebugMode(true)

Alias.name: debug map off
Alias.script: --Disable output of video debug display setTECMapDebugMode(false)

Alias.name: debug timers off
Alias.script: --stop outputing timers to debug window setTECTimerDebugMode(false)

Alias.name: debug test colors
Alias.script: --Run a color test, function in scripts, techfunctions, debug tecColorTest()

AliasGroup.name: atuo checks
AliasGroup.script: --[[ Commands that interact with auto checks the client does. Mostly these will be used to manually run a check for dev testing. ]]--

Alias.name: Room Check
Alias.script: --Check room for characters and fill the room character window. runTECRoomObjectCheck()

Alias.name: room refresh
Alias.script: --checks if a refresh notification is already in window displays it if needed tecRoomCharRefreshNotification()

Alias.name: ac .
Alias.script: runTECRoomObjectCheck(true) --check room for characters display all to screen

Alias.name: Username:
Alias.script: -- This alias gets 'triggered' from triggers - login - secret trigger tecUsername = matches[2] --the first item echo("\nPlease enter your password.\n") clearCmdLine() --clear the text user entered from command line tecPasswordEntry = true --used to prevent the password entry from beind sent to servers.
